description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Air North. The average
  contract duration was 0.03 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $41.0K. The longest
  contract was 1.02 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $160.5K.
lookup_name: 'AIR NORTH'
